pr_title: Implement ProxyCustomizer to make real address:port pairs accessible for proxied requests

timeline.bodyText: missing license header so the build failure :)
timeline.author: olamy

replies.bodyText: Indeed. I should pay more attention to that.
replies.author: lorban

timeline.message:
add HttpConfiguration.Customizer implementation that sets request attributes containing the real local and remote address:port pairs

Signed-off-by: Ludovic Orban <lorban@bitronix.be>

add HttpConfiguration.Customizer implementation that sets request attributes containing the real local and remote address:port pairs

timeline.bodyText:
What do we call the equivalent method in DecryptedEndPoint?
We should call it the same... maybe have a WrappedEndPoint common interface/class?
timeline.author: gregw

replies.bodyText: There is no equivalent method in DecryptedEndPoint as SecureRequestCustomizer is only interested in the SslConnection in that case.
replies.author: lorban
